stanza.line: But be contented when that fell arrestarrest
Without all bail shall carry me awayaway
My life hath in this line some interestinterest
Which for memorial still with thee shall staystay
When thou reviewest this thou dost reviewreview
The very part was consecrate to theethee
The earth can have but earth which is his duedue
My spirit is thine the better part of meme
So then thou hast but lost the dregs of lifelife
The prey of worms my body being deaddead
The coward conquest of a wretch knifeknife
Too base of thee to be rememberedremembered
The worth of that is that which it containscontains
And that is this and this with thee remainsremains
